body.raw:
prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
prefix mosp: <http://dfki.de/examples/stig_mosp#>
prefix schema: <http://schema.org/>
prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

DELETE {
    ?s ?p ?o
}
INSERT {
    mosp:RedBox a schema:Product .
    mosp:YellowBox a schema:Product .
    mosp:BlueBox a schema:Product .
    mosp:GreenBox a schema:Product .
    mosp:PurpleBox a schema:Product .
    mosp:BlackBox a schema:Product .
    mosp:WhiteBox a schema:Product .

    mosp:orderSequence rdf:contents rdf:nil .
    mosp:maxStackCount rdf:value "0"^^xsd:int .
}
WHERE { ?s ?p ?o }

request.description: Resets the scenario and deletes everything but the class definitions of the producst

body.raw:
prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
prefix mosp: <http://dfki.de/examples/stig_mosp#>
prefix schema: <http://schema.org/>
prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

DELETE {
    ?s ?p ?o
}
INSERT {
mosp:RedBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:YellowBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:BlueBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:GreenBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:PurpleBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:BlackBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:WhiteBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:OrangeBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:GreyBox  a  schema:Product .

mosp:TurquoiseBox  a  schema:Product .

    mosp:orderSequence rdf:contents rdf:nil .
    mosp:maxStackCount rdf:value "0"^^xsd:int .
}
WHERE { ?s ?p ?o }

request.description: Resets the scenario and deletes everything but the class definitions of the producst
Inserts a random order to the environment. The number of different products can be configured by changing the LIMIT parameter.

Helper to count how many orders of a item size were created ; debug for benchmark scenario creation
Moves the agent to an order. The first move is done random. After this, move will prefer orders with shared products and open stacks

Selects a Random product from within the order that was not yet produced, and adds it to the stack of any order that requires that product. Puts a trace on any order that was served this way to attract the agent to open orders in the next steps
Removes orders and stacks that have been completed

item.name: Move agent to order with concentration
